name: react-action-state-path
description: An alternative to redux for use when components choose children dynamically based on user input and where simplified state needs to be recorded in the URL path so that users can navigate.

scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install -g babel-cli

author: David Fridley
